description: Analyze structured data using Python libraries like Pandas and visualize insights using tools such as Matplotlib and Seaborn.
Assist in developing AI models for prediction and classification tasks using Python and ML frameworks.
Create responsive and accessible front-end web applications using HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript.
Work on both frontend and backend tasks to develop a complete web application using MERN stack.
Perform natural language processing tasks like text cleaning, tokenization, and classification using NLTK and spaCy.
